subject: Soccer
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: To keep their season alive, the Red Bulls on Thursday must beat the Los Angeles Galaxy, whose star player Landon Donovan recently called the Red Bulls the dirtiest team in M.L.S.
snippet: To keep their season alive, the Red Bulls on Thursday must beat the Los Angeles Galaxy, whose star player Landon Donovan recently called the Red Bulls the dirtiest team in M.L.S.
